name: Avoid large Interfaces - too many Methods
description:
Interfaces should have less than X Methods.
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all the Interfaces having more than X Methods.
It provides the following information:
 - Interface full name
 - Number of Methods
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, Interfaces should not have too many Methods.
remediation: Review the Interface design to reduce the number of Methods
